item.title: EXO's Chen, Baekhyun and Xiumin say SM Ent. claims are “no different from telling them to never exercise their legitimate rights” and is “an act of distorting and misleading the key point of this incident.”

item.title: “Of those people around them, there are family and acquaintances, seniors and juniors of the music industry, colleagues, and even staff who have worked together with the artists. item.title:
EXO Chen, Baekhyun and Xiumin respond to SM Entertainment's press statement that "external forces" are influencing them to sue the agency:
